info.name: Userstyles.org - Fluffy heavenly orange
info.description: The new style of site userstyles.org - "Fluffy heavenly orange". For my taste blends well with the style: Userstyles.org - Fixed width centered Try also new year style Userstyles.org - Fluffy snowy orange Donate in Bitcoins or My other styles Новый стиль сайта userstyles.org - "Fluffy heavenly orange".
